channel.title: Help [how do i hide the client files to public?]
channel.description: Hello MoparScape. I currently need help on changing the starter and login text in the chatbox/making the client public so nobody can see the files. if u know how to do one of these post them here/skype me at: T4nk3d please

item.title: Help [how do i hide the client files to public?]
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

move all of the .java files and the compiler into a seperate folder that your not uploading.

right click on one of the class files or folders

>properties
    >attributes
        >hidden

apply to all

then do the same to your “run” and anyother folders you want visible, and unselect hidden

then apply to just that folder or w/e

Read full topic
item.source: Help [how do i hide the client files to public?]

item.title: Help [how do i hide the client files to public?]
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Your first solution would normally be found in client.java, search for the text you see in the chatbox, and than hit “Ctrl+F” on your keyboard, and than in between those " ", that is where your text goes. To change the Starter ItemID’s, simply look up the ItemID of a few items of what you first get, and still in client.java, search "additem(“ITEMID”, if you’re using Delta or something similar to it.

For making the files hidden (Windows), just highlight the ones you want to hide, right click, properties, check the box that says “Hidden”, and hit “Apply”.

Read full topic
item.source: Help [how do i hide the client files to public?]
